<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Lawbringer's Lasso](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1598)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Lawful" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=99" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This enchanted lasso is a [net](/Equipment.aspx?ID=681) that can be used to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) creatures up to 30 feet away, requires a DC 18 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34), and has an [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) DC of 18. It's permanently attached to a 30-foot rope.

 While using the _lawbringer's lasso_ to Grapple, you receive a +1 item bonus to Grapple checks against creatures with the [chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25) trait. If you roll a critical failure on your attempt to Grapple a chaotic creature with the _lawbringer's lasso_, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
